---
title: "Teorema Central do limite"
---

```{r}
#omitir warnings
options(warn = 1)
install.packages("semTools")
library(semTools)
```

Inicia um vetor

```{r}
z = rep(0,500)
```

Gera as amostras

```{r}
for (i in 1:500) {
  m = mvrnonnorm(1000, c(1, 2), matrix(c(10,2,2,5),2,2),
                 skewness = c(5,2), kurtosis = c(3,3))
  #grava a média da amostra
  z[i] = mean(m)
  
  #imprime as 3 primeiras
  if (i < 4){
    hist(m, breaks = 50, main = paste0("Histograma ", i))
  }
}
```

Imprime a distribuição da média das amostras


```{r}
hist(z)
```
